subject: Basketball
College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: Thad Matta of Ohio State and his pal Sean Miller of Xavier  are mirror images of each other, but they had to meet in the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament on Saturday.
snippet: Thad Matta of Ohio State and his pal Sean Miller of Xavier  are mirror images of each other, but they had to meet in the second round of the N.C.A.A. tournament on Saturday.
